options_openInSeparateTab.message: Open this option page in a separate tab

options_section_TreeStyleTabId.message: Internal id for Tree Style Tab

options_contextMenu_RightClickTip.message: Tip: you can right click or middle click context menu items and if you have a popup (such as the bookmark toolbar button menu) then the popup won't be closed.

options_contextMenu_NonFolderBookmarkTip.message: Tip: the bookmark context menu items doesn't need to be used on folders, they work on individual bookmarks as well. When used on such a bookmark the tree structure of the bookmark's folder will be parsed and then the bookmark's tree will be found. If the bookmark represents a child tab then its parent's tree will be used. This allows for restoring smaller trees or re-saving and separating out a smaller part of a larger bookmark collection.

options_hasRestoreTreeContextMenu.message: Show context menu item for Bookmarks to allow restoring trees.

options_hasMigrateContextMenu.message: Show context menu item for Bookmarks to allow changing the Tree Data Format. The affected bookmarks will be saved again in a sibling folder with a different Tree Data Format. The original bookmarks won't be modified or removed.

options_hasTabContextMenu.message: Show context menu item for Firefox Tabs.

options_hasTSTContextMenu.message: Show context menu item in Tree Style Tab's Sidebar. (Use Firefox Tabs option in Firefox 64 and later.)

options_hasMTHContextMenu.message: Show context menu item for Multiple Tab Handler's selection. (Use Firefox Tabs option in Firefox 64 and later.)

options_customTSTContextMenuLabel.message: Custom label for Tree Style Tab's context menu item (place a "&" symbol before the letter that should be used as the keyboard shortcut) (empty to use default label):

options_customMTHContextMenuLabel.message: Custom label for Multiple Tab Handler's context menu item (place a "&" symbol before the letter that should be used as the keyboard shortcut) (empty to use default label):

options_customRestoreTreeContextMenuLabe.message: Custom label for Restore Tree context menu item (place a "&" symbol before the letter that should be used as the keyboard shortcut) (empty to use default label):

options_customMigrateContextMenuLabel.message: Custom label for Change Tree Data Format context menu item (place a "&" symbol before the letter that should be used as the keyboard shortcut) (empty to use default label):

options_customBookmarkTreeContextMenuLab.message: Custom label for Bookmark Tree context menu item on Firefox Tabs (place a "&" symbol before the letter that should be used as the keyboard shortcut) (empty to use default label):

options_customTopLevelBookmarkContextMen.message: Custom label for the top level context menu item if there are multiple bookmark context menu items (place a "&" symbol before the letter that should be used as the keyboard shortcut) (empty to use default label):

options_bookmarkSuffix.message: Text to append to title of bookmark folders saved with Tree Style Tab data:

options_delayAfterTabOpen.message: Delay after opening a tab (-1 to disable):

options_delayBeforeNavigating.message: Delay after opening a tab before navigating to its URL (can't be used when opening as unloaded tabs) (-1 to disable):

options_setParentAfterTabCreate.message: Restore tree data after tabs are opened.

options_openAsDiscardedTabs.message: Open as unloaded tabs. (Requires Firefox 63 or later.)

options_openAsDiscardedTabs_fixOpenerTab.message: Load any ancestor/parent tabs of internal firefox pages such as about:newtab, otherwise they won't be opened.

options_createTempTabWhenRestoring.message: Create a temporary tab to focus on when restoring tabs.

options_tempTabURL.message: URL for the temporary tab (empty to use new tab):

options_gruopUnderTempTabWhenRestoring.message: Group tabs under the temporary tab when restoring tabs.

options_ensureOneParentWhenCreatingTabs.message: Ensure that the created tabs have a common parent.

options_detachIncorrectParentsAfter.message: Detach incorrect parents after a delay (-1 to disable):

options_migrateTreeData_removeSuffix.message: Suffix to ignore from the original bookmark folder's title when creating a sibling folder:

options_migrateTreeData_addSuffix.message: Text to append to the titles of created bookmark folders:

options_migrateTreeData_onlyAddSuffixIfS.message: Only add suffix to created bookmark folders if the original bookmark folder had a suffix that could be ignored.

options_migrateTreeData_fromBookmarkForm.message: Specify how tree data should be parsed from the original bookmarks:

options_migrateTreeData_toBookmarkFormat.message: Specify how tree data should be stored when creating the new bookmarks:

options_bookmarkTreeWithBookmarkFormat.message: Specify how tree data should be stored when saving trees to bookmarks:

options_bookmarkTreeWithBookmarkFormat_w.message: Note: if you change this setting then remember to change the setting for how the tree data is parsed from bookmarks as well.

options_restoreTreeWithBookmarkFormat.message: Specify how tree data should be parsed when restoring trees from bookmarks:

options_restoreTreeWithBookmarkFormat_wa.message: Note: if you change this setting then remember to change the setting for how the tree data is saved to bookmarks as well.

options_bookmarkFormat_info_bookmarkSepa.message:
: This format uses bookmark separators to store tree information.
An odd number of separators before a bookmark indicates that the bookmark is a parent tab. Bookmarks after such a parent bookmark are considered children of it. A pair of bookmark separators in a row decreases the tree level of bookmarks after that point.

options_bookmarkFormat_info_bookmarkFold.message:
: This format uses bookmark folders to store tree information.
The first bookmark in a bookmark folder represents the parent tab and the rest of the bookmarks in the folder are child tabs of that parent tab. If the first item in the bookmark folder is a bookmark folder then the bookmarks will be interpreted as top level tabs.

options_bookmarkFormat_info_bookmarkTitl.message: : This format stores tree data in a prefix on bookmark titles and it is the format used by Tree Style Tab v3.2.0 and later (earlier versions couldn't store tree data at all).

options_bookmarkFormat_info_auto.message: : Attempt to auto detect the tree data format from the bookmarks that should be restored to tabs.

options_bookmarkGroupTabsWithLegacyURL.message: Bookmark Tree Style Tab group tabs with the legacy URI "about:treestyletab-group". This means that they will be opened correctly even if Tree Style Tab's internal id is changed.

options_bookmarkGroupTabsWithLegacyURL_N.message: Use the new custom group tab URI "ext+treestyletab:group" which was introduced in Tree Style Tab v3.1.6 instead of the older "about:treestyletab-group" legacy URI.

options_fixGroupTabURLsOnRestore.message: Fix Tree Style Tab group tab URLs. Allows opening group tabs with the legacy URL "about:treestyletab-group" or the newer "ext+treestyletab:group" URL and also group tab bookmarks that use the wrong internal id for Tree Style Tab.

options_groupTab_restoreUsingSidebery.message: Open group tabs with a URL that Sidebery will load correctly. (Currently need to close and re-open Sidebery's sidebar for the group tabs to be loaded.)

options_treeStyleTabInternalId.message: Cached internal id for Tree Style Tab (used to fix group tabs):

options_warnWhenBookmarkingMoreThan.message: Warn when attempting to bookmark more than this many tabs (-1 to disable):

options_warnWhenRestoringMoreThan.message: Warn when attempting to restore more than this many bookmarks (-1 to disable):

options_resetSettings_Prompt.message: Do you want to reset all settings to default values?

options_Commands_Info.message: Select one of the text inputs below and then make a keyboard combination such as "Alt+X" to bind the keyboard shortcut to the selected text box. You can also press the "Prompt" button and manually write down a keyboard shortcut if you prefer. (Keyboard shortcuts require Firefox 60 or later)

options_Commands_PromptButton_Descriptio.message: Write text representing a keyboard shortcut. For example "Alt+X"

privacyPermissions_Info.message: For this extension to work with private windows it is not enough to just grant it permission from Firefox. Instead you must also change the settings for Tree Style Tab so that it allows this extension to control and get notified about private windows via its APIs. To do this open up Tree Style Tab's option page and expand the "Extra Features via Other Addons" section. Inside it you must enabled the checkbox to "Notify Messages from Private Windows" for "Bookmark Tree for Tree Style Tab".

privacyPermissions_hasPrivacyPermission_.message: Waiting for a private window to be opened

privacyPermissions_hasTreeStyleTabPrivac.message: Tree Style Tab is allowed to send messages for private windows:
Not registered with Tree Style Tab yet

privacyPermissions_warnAboutMisconfigure.message: Open a popup window with a warning when misconfigured privacy permissions are detected. (When one of the below permissions is granted while the other isn't.)

privatePermissionPage_Title.message: Misconfigured Permissions for Private Windows - Bookmark Tree for Tree Style Tab

privatePermissionPage_Info.message: The addon "Bookmark Tree for Tree Style Tab" detected that you might want to give it access to private windows but privacy permissions were not configured correctly. To do this correctly you need to grant the extension access to private windows and also change the options for "Tree Style Tab" so that it responds to tree data requests for private windows.

notifications_BookmarkTree_Confirm_Title.message: Do you really want to bookmark these tabs?

notifications_BookmarkTree_Confirm_Messa.message: Do you really want to bookmark $count$ tab(s)? If so then click on this notification, otherwise close it.
notifications_BookmarkTree_Confirm_Messa.description: Note that this will be shown in a notification and they have a maximum number of character that will be shown. If the message is too long the message will be cut of early.

notifications_RestoreTree_Confirm_Title.message: Do you really want to open these bookmarks?

notifications_RestoreTree_Confirm_Messag.message: Do you really want to open $count$ bookmark(s)? If so then click on this notification, otherwise close it.
notifications_RestoreTree_Confirm_Messag.description: Note that this will be shown in a notification and they have a maximum number of character that will be shown. If the message is too long the message will be cut of early.
